backend/main.mo: Motoko backend canister implementing products CRUD, search, sorting, sample seeding with admin-only access control and user profiles.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to relevant frontend files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for many frontend files across the application.
frontend/artifacts/.gitkeep: Placeholder file ensuring the artifacts directory is tracked in version control.
frontend/docs/PLAY_STORE_TWA_GUIDE.md: Guide explaining how to package the PWA as a Trusted Web Activity and publish it to the Google Play Store.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and theme values for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML template defining metadata, manifest links, icons, and bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, colors, start URL, shortcuts, and display settings.
frontend/public/offline.html: Custom offline fallback page shown when the PWA is unreachable without network connectivity.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing precaching, cache cleanup, and network-first fetch handling with offline fallback.
frontend/scripts/twa-build-aab-release.s: Builds a signed release AAB using Bubblewrap, prompting for TWA directory and keystore details.
frontend/scripts/twa-build-apk-debug.sh: Builds a debug APK from the TWA project and copies it to an artifacts folder.
frontend/scripts/twa-build-apk-release.s: Builds a signed release APK using Bubblewrap with user‑provided keystore information.
frontend/scripts/twa-init.sh: Initializes a Bubblewrap TWA project from the live PWA manifest with prompts for package name and output directory.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the React Router configuration, registers the PWA service worker, and runs a backend smoke check.
frontend/src/backend.did.ts: Empty placeholder file for backend interface definitions.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminProdu: Dialog wrapper for creating or editing products, embedding the AdminProductForm.
Form for creating or editing products with validation, image upload, and submit handling.
Admin table for listing products with edit, delete, and stock toggle actions.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays a product card with image, price, category, stock status, and navigation to product details.
frontend/src/components/PwaInstallPrompt: Handles PWA installation prompts, showing install UI and fallbacks based on browser support.
frontend/src/components/StoreFooter.tsx: Renders the store’s footer with description, quick links, and branding.
frontend/src/components/StoreHeader.tsx: Responsive store header with navigation, authentication check, mobile menu, and PWA install prompt.
frontend/src/components/StoreLayout.tsx: Wraps pages with a header, footer, and main content outlet for the store layout.
frontend/src/config/appConfig.ts: Defines app slug and basic metadata such as name and tagline.
frontend/src/config/index.ts: Loads environment config and creates backend canister actors with IDL definitions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking. Wraps Dfinity AuthClient setup with custom options.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching, creating, updating, deleting, seeding, and toggling stock for products via the backend actor. Invalidates product queries on mutation success.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables for light and dark modes and applying global base styles. Configures colors, spacing, and typography tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app by rendering App within React Query and Internet Identity providers. Loads global styles and initializes the QueryClient.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin interface that requires Internet Identity login to manage products, showing product list, create/edit dialogs, and loading/error states. Uses hooks for authentication and product data.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page showing hero section, feature highlights, and a list of featured products with loading skeletons. Uses navigation and product data fetching.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Displays a 404-style page with navigation options back to home or products. Uses card and button UI components.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Product detail view that loads product data, shows loading and error states, and displays full product information with fallback images. Provides navigation back to the product list.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Displays products with search, sorting, loading skeletons, and error handling using useProducts.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker on load and logs registration, update events, or failures.
frontend/src/utils/imageToDataUrl.ts: Converts an image File to a base64 data URL using FileReader.
frontend/src/utils/runtimeSmokeCheck.ts: Performs a non-blocking backend connectivity check by fetching products and logging results.
frontend/src/utils/toUserMessage.ts: Normalizes unknown error values into user-friendly message strings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL or session-stored parameters for routing and persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and included plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, feature states, requirements, and pending PWA asset tasks.
